displayName.english: Load A Car Onto The Tow Truck

description.english: So much money? How did you do that?

Now you're in the big leagues!
Is that smoke coming from your tires?
You should charge for air shows!
You're getting good at this detective thing.
You see everything... like a car whisperer.
Deal of the day, every day!
You’re running a car empire now!
Got a garage full of stolen dreams!
You belong in a heist movie!
Locks tremble when they see you.
Master key? Nah, you don’t need one!
For when you wanna cruise... slowly.

description.english: You crushed it! Now, stay sharp—Season 2 is just around the corner.

Because slow just isn’t in your vocabulary.
